title: What are your favorite Streams to watch?
body:
I reached Top 400 early this season. Would you guys be interested in watching me smurf around Bronze-Silver elo? 

Commentary would be educational, but also entertaining, and I would try out different builds as well as strats. 

Would be answering all questions in chat and open to discussions about gameplay/meta/champs/etc.

Can also duo with viewers.
